sense.def:
To conjure something into existence
pomeni poskrbeti, da se nekaj prikaže kot po čarovniji.

seg.quote: He appeared with a small bucket he'd apparently conjured from nowhere.

sense.def:
To conjure up a memory, picture, or idea
pomeni v mislih ustvariti spomin, sliko ali zamisel.

seg.quote: To many people, the name Kalahari conjures up images of a desert of unrelenting aridity.
